raw_text: ATTUKORALE – UDUMULLAGE – PODINONA (Baptismal and preferred name : Shanti Bernadette Podinona Attukorale) – Beloved aunt of Kusum Athukorala,​ Gunadasa,​ Kumarihami,​ Malini,​ the late Wijesiri and great aunt to Chandrika and Janith,​ much loved friend of the late Yvonne and Thomas CanagaRetna and second mother to their children,​ including the late Wilfred Tilak and the late Christopher Rajit and adored by their surviving children Sevanti,​ Priyanti and Amitti and grandchildren Benedict,​ Anoushka,​ Jessica,​ Joey and Bethan – passed away peacefully,​ aged 97,​ on 10th October 2023 in St. James’ Hospital,​ Leeds,​ West Yorkshire,​ England. Funeral will take place at Christ the King,​ Battyeford. Date to be confirmed.067980
